游戏很好玩，给女朋友口了一次就给我买了，虽然口腔溃疡了，但是值得【赞赞赞】！

2021年，现在的杀鸡不论是人类还是屠夫现在都是秒排，steam热度一直都保持在靠前的位置，可见热度还是有的。这款游戏可玩性极高，人类玩的好可以无限嘲讽屠夫，屠夫玩的好，通常不用守尸，甚至巴不得人类互相救多刷点分。对比第五人格肯定在玩法和氛围上更胜一筹，第五人格套路单一，电机和板子包括椅子都是很固定的，变化不大，很无聊，电机周围都很安全，都有板窗这样的环境优势，而杀鸡则相反。
       黎明杀机的人类上分与否和逃跑人数的关系不大，只要你自己玩的好分高就上段，屠夫也一样，极限的时候只挂死一个人也能上分，这就是在不对称游戏中找到对称。
       另外这个游戏不需要肝，买了游戏之后消费很低，不氪金通过转生和任务都可以得到好皮肤，dlc也相当便宜，打折十几块钱可以搞到新角色，第五人格一个金皮的钱，在杀鸡买三套好皮肤加一个角色都够了。

Original review (507 hrs) - Welp, this is a very fun game, once you know what you're doing. Starting out in this game might take some time, but in my opinion, it's very worth getting to know it. It's also super enjoyable with friends. :)

Current review (807 hrs) - Not worth the pain

Current current (881 hrs) - It's worth it again
The game basically allows you to satisfyingly play the part in an 80s slasher/horror movie. The thrills and nerves are like nothing i'd ever experienced in a multiplayer game.

Bad game design at its worst
Incredibly buggy and absurdly inconsistent gameplay.
Playing killer requires little to no skill whilst the survivor learning curve is incredibly steep.
That creates a game with no real sense of progress that ultimately feels like punching the sharp end of a knife indefinitely.

This game is also a breeding ground for toxicity in the likes that I have never seen before, killers will camp hooks and survivors will purposefully grief each other.

To have fun playing dead by daylight, you will need to either play as killer or gather three other friends to play on comms (Which makes the match incredibly hard for the killers and just ruins whatever semblant of fun they may have)

Dead by daylight is and will permanently be unbalanced and rife with bugs. Don't play this if you value your time.

it's a really fun game and it's those types of games where you love the game but you also hate it at the same time, a love-hate relationship. I won't lie to you, there are many toxic players and now that i have played this game for some time on both console and PC, it's really fun and you can use to the toxic people out there but overall, it's a game I would definitely recommend to someone else.
The game is fun with friends and comunity is fun.

Game has face camping killers , Prox campers. Killers get no penalty for face camping but survivors get a penalty no matter what. The game is not balanced , Pallet drops are always choppy and killers hitbox can still hit you. Game still has a bunch of broken mechanics. It's not fun and i do not suggest playing this trash game. Waste of money. If they game did something with killers preventing camping then the game would be more enjoyable. Also just recently got disconnected from the dbd server and said the killer disconnected but then when i go back to the lobby i got a 5 min ban and double pipped down because of it. Sick game, Don't play this garbage game.

Lo conocí porque empecé a jugar el bootleg chino que se llama identityV. Decidí, claramente, jugar el original.
He jugado casi nada, pero he quedado con muy mala impresión. Ojo, poniendo de vara al bootleg chino, siento que no pudo sobrepasarlo. Jugar como asesino es divertido, pero como superviviente no.
La espera de las colas a veces aburre, la dirección de arte me parece de lo más aburrida, lamentablemente. Los sonidos son terribles. Los constantes quejidos de los personajes, los gritos.
El matchmaking no es bueno.
Al menos en lo personal, la parte visual y sonora de juego fue lo que más me disgustó.

Хоть игра и дико анбалансная, хоть почти каждый раз выходишь с нее с желанием снести ее к чертям и впредь никогда к ней больше не притрагиваться, но что-то в ней всё же заставляет вновь и вновь возвращаться к себе, периодически заходить в игру, чтобы в очередной раз починить геники, поиграть сначала в прятки, а потом в салочки с маньяком, и умереть в тысячный раз от очередного кемпера-туннелера. :) А это значит, что несмотря на все свои недостатки, игра всё-таки хорошая и пока что еще безальтернативная в своем жанре.
Играть только в пати)

Un juego que se recuperó del declive repentinamente, siempre fue bueno pero tenía ciertas características de matchmaking que le jugaban en contra. Eso ya no está. Servers dedicados y contenido mensual. Juegazo, vale la pena totalmente, si vas a jugar solo o con amigos.

=============================

CONTRAS--
No tenes todos los personajes disponibles y dependiendo del que desees deberás abonar con dinero REAL. Este critero se basa en si es o no patentado. Por ejemplo, Freddy, proveniente de la saga de películas tiene patente, por tanto el DLC valdrá dinero real, Hill Billy, por otro lado, no existe en ninguna película (más allá de inspiraciones) por tanto se puede conseguir vía gameplay.
